scenario_text.value:
Hey, you don’t think we’re being followed, do
you?

Nah, we’re fine! Now come on, we gotta go see
Her Majesty!

Sure was! But it sounds like they didn’t spot
us. I have to wonder, though.
Why do they keep walking around the castle?

Whoa! Takuma, look at that! They’re going
inside!

Oh yeah, they are! So...that must be a back
door!

(Since the castle gate was closed, we had no
idea how to get in.)
We sure didn’t! But let’s head inside.

Wow, this hall is really impressive. It’s
like we’re in a real castle.

Which way do you think those little guys
went?

(I can’t believe we lost sight of them
already. Where could they have gone?)

I’m not sure, but let’s try heading farther
in.

Okay, Agumon! Let’s head after them again,
and be sure not to get caught this time!
